TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed StylusPointPropertyUnit extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the unit of measurement for a property.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example creates an <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> object from a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> and gets the information for each <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo> in the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>.
